job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.industry: Defense & Space,Information Technology and Services,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing
job.description: The Naval Nuclear Laboratory is seeking a Senior Data Engineer to join a growing team dedicated to collecting and transforming data from the United States Nuclear Navy for analytics throughout the Laboratory.<br><br>As a Senior Data Engineer, you will be part of a team responsible for designing, developing, optimizing, and maintaining the Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) process for incoming shipboard data used in naval nuclear propulsion systems in a Hadoop environment.<br><br>You will evaluate new and emerging technologies to deliver scalable solutions to transforming shipboard data in an enterprise-wide data warehouse from which operational metrics and support analytics can be easily and reliably generated.<br><br><strong><u>Preferred Skills Include<br></u></strong><ul><li>Knowledge of distributed technologies, such as Hadoop, Hive, Spark.</li> <li>Experience in Linux shell scripting and software development using languages such as SQL, Python, Scala.</li> <li>Experience in optimization and performance tuning of ETL workloads and understanding of database internals.</li></ul>
